sub_topic: Calculating the surface area of a cube.
message_1: What is the surface area of a cube with a side length of 5 cm? (Answer: 150 cm²)
message_2:
To find the surface area of a cube, we use the formula:

Surface area = 6 × (side length)²

In this case, the side length is 5 cm. So, we have:

Surface area = 6 × (5 cm)²
Surface area = 6 × 25 cm²
Surface area = 150 cm²
